title: please disable 4 man queues in norms
body:
'>be me
'>q for norms, get placed with 4 premades
'>call one of them out for being mentally ill
'>they all threaten to report me
'>they all feed
'>trash experience, ruined game
'>repeat

replies.body:
> call one of them out for being mentally ill

So...your ass started it and you think it has something to do with 4-man premades?
Please dont blame premades for the fact you got banned for calling people r%%%%%s.
You know calling someone mentally ill for just a game is toxic and against the rules right. Any verbal abuse is. I'd report you to in a heartbeat

> [{quoted}](name=CampYourLane,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-09-05T00:02:28.862+0000)
>
> hasn't even been an hour and the boards white knights have raided this post already

A lot of the people on this board in particular have this annoying holier than thou attitude and will go into every single thread in order to put people down for no other reason than to make themselves feel better. Of course, they're conveniently ignoring the fact that no one is perfect and expecting every single person other than themselves to be a sad beta while trolls and dickheads on their team screw everything up is the stupidest thing ever.

If they don't even have a half decent argument, they will of course simply downvote spam, like has been done here.

> If they don't even have a half decent argument

And what if the OP doesn't have a half-decent argument?

This one called someone r%%%%%ed and is surprised he got punished.

> [{quoted}](name=GatekeeperTDS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-05T00:39:23.760+0000)
>
> And what if the OP doesn't have a half-decent argument?
> 
> This one called someone r%%%%%ed and is surprised he got punished.

He didn't say that, he said they had mental illness, which is just a medical term. That's not even the main point of what he wrote,  if you read the title he put at the top of the page?

Oh? What's the MAIN POINT of what he wrote with 5 lines of toxic chat?

> which is just a medical term

Is the OP a doctor? No. Why is he insulting his team and expecting to not be punished?

> [{quoted}](name=GatekeeperTDS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-05T00:44:47.652+0000)
>
> Oh? What's the MAIN POINT of what he wrote with 5 lines of toxic chat?
> 
> Is the OP a doctor? No. Why is he insulting his team and expecting to not be punished?

Oh ok, so you're cherry picking. Yeah, I don't talk to cherry pickers. Must be nice to ignore something that you deem inconvenient for you. Enjoy.
You aren't even the OP. I don't need your permission to post, and I don't care who you want to talk to. Jesus Christ lol
i didnt say anything about me expecting to not get punished. also i didn't

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-05T00:15:14.530+0000)
>
> If they don't even have a half decent argument, they will of course simply downvote spam, like has been done here.

I mean, when you're making these generalizations about board members that isn't really driving forward any sort of productive discussion, can you honestly blame getting downvotes on players of this board?

You could apply the same logic you used to the OP's statement: Not everyone's perfect in the OP's example. You could point out how maybe he was wrong for insulting others, or others in the game OP mentions were wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2019-09-05T05:35:34.270+0000)
>
> I mean, when you're making these generalizations about board members that isn't really driving forward any sort of productive discussion, can you honestly blame getting downvotes on players of this board?
> 
> You could apply the same logic you used to the OP's statement: Not everyone's perfect in the OP's example. You could point out how maybe he was wrong for insulting others, or others in the game OP mentions were wrong.

Considering I was talking to the OP and only the OP, I fully expected people here to take it personally. I'm hardly surprised it got downvoted, especially when people mistake the downvote button for a disagree button. Given what information OP has given us, it is equally likely that he genuinely believes one or more of the individuals on his team to be mentally sick and if they were treating him poorly enough, that is an adequate response. How exactly is that an insult? Telling someone they could be mentally ill isn't an insult. Oh, so we can't say that because it might hurt their precious little feelings, even if it could be a genuine problem that requires said individual to seek psychiatric help? The audacity of people on this board to think that every single person who posts threads here is some sort of lowlife scumbag makes them just as insufferable as anyone saying the "R word."

To be honest, I'd be more bothered by that if the very people in this thread didn't immediately try to put words in his mouth and blame him for calling someone the "R word" even though he didn't (that's a stupid phrase btw, r%%%%%ed used to be a medi%%%%%erm as well). I also have no idea why we're following Riot's rules for communication when they can't even live up to those rules in their own workplace.

I couldn't care less about downvotes on this board. Their habits not just in this thread, but other threads too speak for themselves well enough.

Oh btw, yes I did notice that one person following all my posts and downvoting every single one of them. To you I say, find a better way to spend your time.

That's some next level mental gymnastics. Quite impressive!

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=0000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-05T05:50:47.741+0000)
>
> Wow, I care so little about what you think I nearly passed out! Good job!

Tho apparently not little enough to not reply in a condescending fashion like per usual.

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2019-09-05T05:45:27.320+0000)
>
> Telling someone they could be mentally ill isn't an insult. Oh, so we can't say that because it might hurt their precious little feelings, even if it could be a genuine problem that requires said individual to seek psychiatric help?

There's no way OP knew enough about some random person in a video game to know they require psychological help. You're grasping at straws here.

> [{quoted}](name=Jhins Girlfriend,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=000000000000000100000002,timestamp=2019-09-05T17:38:04.190+0000)
>
> There's no way OP knew enough about some random person in a video game to know they require psychological help. You're grasping at straws here.

I didn't say he KNEW. I said "could"

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=0000000000000001000000020000,timestamp=2019-09-05T17:39:36.819+0000)
>
> I didn't say he KNEW. I said "could"

And once again, there's no way he thought oh maybe this person needs serious help based on a league of legends game. Regardless a rando on your team doesn't need unsolicited health advice -- though I sincerely doubt that's what OP was doing based on his wording.

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2019-09-05T05:45:27.320+0000)
>
> Considering I was talking to the OP and only the OP,...

That seems to directly conflict with this statement in your post;

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-04T22:54:48.396+0000)
>
> ... To all the people who were going to say this anyway...

And I find this bit to be particularly hypocritical;

>To be honest, I'd be more bothered by that if the very people in this thread didn't immediately try to put words in his mouth

Considering that the first post in the thread was from you and involved doing just that. Placing words in people's mouths.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=000000000000000100000001,timestamp=2019-09-05T13:57:11.986+0000)
>
> That seems to directly conflict with this statement in your post;
> 
> And I find this bit to be particularly hypocritical;
> 
> Considering that the first post in the thread was from you and involved doing just that. Placing words in people's mouths.

Fascinating stuff. I am well capable of seeing trends in a BOARD. Whether any INDIVIDUAL chooses to be insulted by it is entirely their choice. The board's ability to make assumptions about an individual's character based solely on 7 lines of text though is presumptuous and arrogant.

Instantly downvote without reading. See what I mean?

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=0000000000000001000000010000,timestamp=2019-09-05T14:30:51.693+0000)
>
> Fascinating stuff. I am well capable of seeing trends in a BOARD. Whether any INDIVIDUAL chooses to be insulted by it is entirely their choice. The board's ability to make assumptions about an individual's character based solely on 7 lines of text though is presumptuous and arrogant.

None of that addresses the points in my post. You claimed to only be addressing the OP, yet you literally addressed the people you attempt to strawman. You criticize people putting words into other's mouths, yet your first post in the thread involves using quotes that no one had used. 

> Instantly downvote without reading. See what I mean?

How do you know that people didn't read? Seems like you're jumping to conclusions without evidence.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=00000000000000010000000100000000,timestamp=2019-09-05T15:09:27.175+0000)
>
> None of that addresses the points in my post. You claimed to only be addressing the OP, yet you literally addressed the people you attempt to strawman. You criticize people putting words into other's mouths, yet your first post in the thread involves using quotes that no one had used. 
> 
> How do you know that people didn't read? Seems like you're jumping to conclusions without evidence.

Uh...yeah? I was talking about the general trends of the boards? Involves using quotes no one had ever used huh? Only two possibilities with this: 

- You think these phrases had never been used in the entirety of League's history, which is wrong. People have asked for separate 4 man queues from solo queues before and these were the arguments made against it. I'm hardly putting words into people's mouths when these are the literal things people say in order to argue against separating 4 man queues. The only people with any reason to take offence to this are the people who argued these things personally. I mean, you would've understood this if you read the first post, but I guess I'm expected to casually ignore that.

- You're talking about how no one in the thread said these phrases, which given the fact that it's the first post, is extremely obvious and a very stupid thing to bring up.

How do I know people didn't read it?
....
Maybe because I posted, refreshed after a few seconds and it was at 0 already? Derp.

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=000000000000000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-05T15:30:16.009+0000)
>
> Uh...yeah? I was talking about the general trends of the boards? Involves using quotes no one had ever used huh? Only two possibilities with this: 
> 
> - You think these phrases had never been used in the entirety of League's history, which is wrong. People have asked for separate 4 man queues from solo queues before and these were the arguments made against it. I'm hardly putting words into people's mouths when these are the literal things people say in order to argue against separating 4 man queues. The only people with any reason to take offence to this are the people who argued these things personally. I mean, you would've understood this if you read the first post, but I guess I'm expected to casually ignore that.
> 
> - You're talking about how no one in the thread said these phrases, which given the fact that it's the first post, is extremely obvious and a very stupid thing to bring up.

[There's a third reason.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Straw_man) Especially since neither the first nor the second match up.

 
> How do I know people didn't read it?
> ....
> Maybe because I posted, refreshed after a few seconds and it was at 0 already? Derp.

You didn't write a story. You wrote less than 10 sentences. It only takes a few seconds to read that.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=0000000000000001000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-05T18:56:48.950+0000)
>
> [There's a third reason.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Straw_man) Especially since neither the first nor the second match up.
> 
> You didn't write a story. You wrote less than 10 sentences. It only takes a few seconds to read that.

That's so fascinating. I'm sorry you don't know about the people who said this stuff in the past, but ultimately, your lack of knowledge with regards to these common arguments against 4man premades isn't really my problem. 

And yes, you can read that in a few seconds. If your goal is to not understand. That seems to be going around though.

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=00000000000000010000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-05T19:07:37.328+0000)
>
> That's so fascinating. I'm sorry you don't know about the people who said this stuff in the past, 

I seem to recall stating that the first reason didn't match up. I guess you were reading but not understanding.

>your lack of knowledge with regards to these common arguments against 4man premades isn't really my problem.

Your problem is you didn't really come to the thread for a discussion. You came to mud fling. Even when a different reason was given that didn't match any of the skewed quotes you had in you first post you trolled as a reply instead of actually arguing anything.

> And yes, you can read that in a few seconds. If your goal is to not understand. That seems to be going around though.

I can understand while I read. If you can't do the same that seems to be a personal problem and I would prefer if you didn't push the same standards onto others.

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=00000000000000010000000100000000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-09-05T20:29:57.301+0000)
>
> Not like you addressed anything I explained and I explained it in earnest. 

I did, right here;

"All while ignoring the reasoning behind those arguments as well as adding "Durr" at the start of each *quote* in a childish attempt to belittle the argument. Aka, a strawman argument."

You attempting to pass it off as anything but a strawman argument doesn't change what it actually is. I also address your post here;

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-09-05T03:58:47.935+0000)

> 
> Harassing people is already punishable by the system.

The first post I made in the thread. But we saw how your replies went with that.

>Your unwillingness to accept that I explained it to you is your problem and your problem alone. Try not to project it onto others.

The only thing you've made clear is what I stated earlier;

"Your problem is you didn't really come to the thread for a discussion. You came to mud fling."

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=00000000000000010000000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-05T20:27:01.120+0000)

All while ignoring the reasoning behind those arguments as well as adding "Durr" at the start of each \*quote\* in a childish attempt to belittle the argument. Aka, a strawman argument.

> 
> Fixed for you. Enjoy.

Thanks for providing an example of trolling instead of actually addressing an argument.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=00000000000000010000000100000000000000000000000000000002,timestamp=2019-09-05T20:33:23.826+0000)

>

> 
> "Your problem is you didn't really come to the thread for a discussion. You came to mud fling."

Please refer to the previous posts for clarification as it has already been provided for your benefit. Thank you.

But you weren't actually talking to OP and only OP. You posted on a PUBLIC FORUM. Your words are out there for literally anyone with an account to respond to and downvote if they think you are wrong. The downvote is, in fact, a disagree button as well as an irrelevant button and a toxic button. It's a button that lets someone say "this is bad."

> [{quoted}](name=Luigi Nooooo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=000000000000000100000003,timestamp=2019-09-05T20:39:27.819+0000)

Your words are out there for literally anyone with an account to respond to and downvote if they think you are wrong. The downvote is, in fact, a disagree button as well as an irrelevant button and a toxic button. It's a button that lets someone say "this is bad."

Not really. Thank you for your input.

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-04T22:54:48.396+0000)
>
> Careful, this is an unpopular idea that could get downvoted really fast. Here, I'll answer it in the place of the ignorant people who are going to come here to do just that.
> 
> "durr if you don't allow 4 man queues in norms, the queues will take too long." Some of us don't care about waiting a bit longer for better quality games. Get it?
> 
> "durr even if they report you, it'll only count as one report." No shit. Hard for this to matter when toxic premades are literally everywhere and are more interested in protecting their own shittiness and passing the blame to you.
> 
> ...That's it really. Those are the two most common arguments against disabling 4 man queues in norms. To all the people who were going to say this anyway, you're welcome.
> 
> Called it.

Or, you know, it's not right to prevent 4 friends from being able to play together. **ESPECIALLY** in the non-competitive mode. Friends have a right to play with each other. There is nothing wrong with a pre-made of 4 people, only people who harass others.

Harassing people is already punishable by the system.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-09-05T03:58:47.935+0000)
>
> Or, you know, it's not right to prevent 4 friends from being able to play together. **ESPECIALLY** in the non-competitive mode. Friends have a right to play with each other. There is nothing wrong with a pre-made of 4 people, only people who harass others.
> 
> Harassing people is already punishable by the system.

Ok!

> [{quoted}](name=Anatera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IEcZBKwB,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2019-09-05T03:59:56.862+0000)
>
> Ok!

Glad you could agree with my reasoning.
just out of curiosity how did u know they were a 4 man? did they have similar users or were part of a clan with a visible clan tag or are you just assuming because they ganged up on you?

There is literally no reason to hate 4-person premades.
It makes no sense at all.
The level of control freak that people have is quite worrisome to be honest.
If anything, maybe you should be excluded from playing the game if you do not want other people to play with their friends.
Specific people do need to be banned. Anyone who int'feeds, afks, etc. sure. But that is not nearly all pre-mades. This makes no sense.

No. Sorry you don't have friends to 4 man with, but Riot isn't gonna disallow it. People play together. Sorry man. I know it must suck but you're gonna get shitty experiences with any amount of friends playing together. Hell, even if everyone is solo queueing, there's still gonna be that. Especially if you go around "calling people out" in a fucking pointless video game.

Why are you trying to green text on the boards? and you're not even doing it right

\>lul
Welcome to league
